title: Biggest Number Wins
description:
Tim Kurkjian and Buster discuss Mike Trout and Tim’s disinterest in talking about themselves, Aaron Judge hitting 60 home runs, why they think Judge will land in San Francisco this offseason, the upcoming musical chairs of shortstops, the NL East and the Guardians. Then, Buster talks to Freddie Freeman from the Dodgers’ clubhouse. Later, Sarah Langs on consecutive “sacs” in a game, Ahmed Rosario’s big Saturday and Hunter Green lighting up the radar gun.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Buster Olney
itunes:subtitle: LISTEN: Tim Kurkjian and Buster discuss Aaron Judge knocking on history's door, shortstop musical chairs and the Guardians. Plus, Sarah Langs plays The Numbers Game
